> "This place need repairs"said Talon said more for
> her than her friends
=

Lord elder chuckled over the loud speakers, "Yes, it does." He coughed 
a =
couple of times and then continued, "But we cannot repair the place 
too mu=
ch. It has to look like it crash landed when the Autobots and 
Decpticons w=
ake up in a couple million years."

There is a slight pause as a few lights=
 flicker and then resume their 
normal hue and brighteness, "Come to the co=
mmand center." 

With a sudden jolt an explosion goes off outside the Ark, =
and then 
another, and then several more as the ground and walls are rocked=
! 

Alarms began to go off!
